service_name: PCI DSS v3.0 Compliant Virtual Private Cloud
page_content:
ServerChoice

PCI DSS v3.0 Compliant Virtual Private Cloud

ServerChoice’s PCI DSS v3.0 compliant Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) combines the flexibility and cost-savings of a public cloud with the security and performance of a private cloud. It provides maximum performance, scalability, resilience and security. The service is Pan Government Accredited (PGA) for UK Official at 2-2-4 (formerly IL2).

Features

  • PCI compliant cloud hosting
  • PGA for UK Official at 2-2-4 (formerly IL2)
  • Flexible and scalable: elastic and burst options available
  • Highly resilient infrastructure means more uptime for your business
  • Guaranteed SLA
  • 24x7x365 monitoring by our on-site NOC
  • Hosted in our own world-class datacentres, up to Tier4 standard
  • PCI DSS v3.0 Level 1 Service Provider
  • ISO 27001 certified

Benefits

  • PCI-ready cloud hosting platform
  • Hosting from a PCI DSS v3.0 Level 1 Service Provider
  • More uptime for your business
  • Easily flex services up and down with demand
  • Secure foundation for your business
  • Increased performance with lower costs
  • Free access to our Information Security Consultants
  • Free UK-based support, 24x7x365
  • 24x7x365 monitoring by our on-site NOC
  • Work with a flexible, understanding company

Pricing

£2.5 per unit

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Year
  • Trial option available
